dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: I’ll protect you with all I can, Manager! Oh, um… Don’t go too far ahead…

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Have you had a good night’s sleep? Sorry? Oh, you’re wondering why I’m up so early? That’s just what the Zwei are like.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: It’s lunchtime. I usually have food that’s easy to carry around. I guess I’ve grown a habit from my training days.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I should stay wide awake at night. You never know when an ambush might happen.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Even if I can’t land a devastating blow… I can take one for you.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Wagh, you startled me…! Sorry, I just don’t really like being snuck up on.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: When I first started joint training with Don Quixote, it was rather troubling… But now, I’ve gotten quite used to her antics.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: In the past… I’d lost many precious people because I didn’t know what to do. That experience taught me desperation. It’s what drives me to do my best now.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I’d rather be a broken shield than a runaway. …I don’t want to suffer losing anyone else.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Manager…? Please let me know in advance if you plan to go somewhere… I’m worried sick.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I’ll work even harder! I’ll be sure to not let you down.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: To be an unyielding shield.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I’ll protect you with all my strength!

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I’ll try my best to keep the others safe!

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: This way!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Now’s our chance!

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ah!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: I did it!

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: I couldn’t protect you…

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Thank you for having faith in me!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I couldn’t keep harm away…

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I think I’m on the way to becoming a proper guardian.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I gave it my all, and I’m glad my effort paid off.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I couldn’t protect the others. I thought things would be different this time…
